Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class I bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Trichamide consists of 11 amino acids, including two cysteine-derived thiazole groups, and is cyclized by an N-C terminal amide bond.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Structure of trichamide, a cyclic peptide from the bloom-forming cyanobacterium Trichodesmium erythraeum, predicted from the genome sequence.
Literature.Author: Sudek S, Haygood MG, Youssef DT, Schmidt EW.
